cards.name: Dreamcatcher

effect.hex: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck. Then, place them back in any order.
effect.switch: Name the top card of the deck. If named incorrectly, switch back with the same switching minion (this is another switch event).

cards.flavor: Dreams are signs of what's to come, but the sometimes don't cone true.

cards.name: Constellation

effect.hex: Activate this minion's /Command/ effect, but do not reshuffle on naming incorrectly.
effect.command: Name the top card of the deck. If named correctly, you can activate its /hex/ effect. If named incorrectly, reshuffle that card.

cards.flavor: When the fate amongst the stars are against you, there is not much to do but plea.

cards.name: Shards Reflection

effect.hex: Deal 2 damage to the opposing minion. Then name the top card of the deck. If named correctly, add it to this minion's /ancestry/ and activate this minion's /Hex/ effect again.
effect.reshuffle: Instead of reshuffled into the deck, this card goes to the enemy's hand.

cards.flavor: You can see yourself within these shards. Or, the you inside the shards can see yourself.

cards.name: Snake Eyes

effect.hex: Name a card. If that card is in your opponent's hand, your opponent reshuffles all his/her hand cards, and draw that many cards.
effect.trait: Whenever the opponent draws or name a card, deal 1 damage to the opposing minion.

cards.flavor: The cunning eyes that sees through.

cards.name: Comet Blaze

effect.hex: Without looking at the card, you may rearrage up to 8 top cards of the deck.
effect.reshuffle: Instead of reshuffling, put this card on top of the deck. The deck is not shuffled.

cards.flavor: The trails in the sky, inevitable..

effect.hex: Look at the top 3 cards of the deck. Add one to your hand, and reshuffle the rest.
effect.reshuffle: Your opponent choose a card from his/her hand. That card will be reshuffled after this card is reshuffled.

cards.name: Glowing Tapestry

effect.hex: You can put any number of card from your hand to the top of the deck, in any order.
effect.trait: Whenever you name a card correctly, this minion deals 2 damage to a random enemy minion.

cards.flavor: Masterful craft often comes with a power that is almost supernatural.

cards.name: From Light, Darkness

effect.hex: Reshuffle a card from this minion's /ancestry/. Then you can order the rest of its /ancestry/.
effect.reshuffle: Before reshuffling, deal 2 damage to opposing minion, and name a card. If named correctly, you can summon a Fates minion for free.

cards.flavor: Prophecy foretolds of an unending cycle.

cards.name: From Darkness, Light

effect.hex: Reshuffle a card from this minion's /ancestry/. Then you can look at the top 2 cards of the deck.
effect.reshuffle: Before reshuffling, heals 1 HP and name a card. If named correctly, you can summon a Fates minion for free.

cards.flavor: Prophecy foretolds of an unending cycle.

boss.name: Three Sisters
boss.summon: When the 3rd or more correct naming occurs.
boss.return: At the end of the turn, when no card is named correctly.

effect.hex: All naming is considered correct until the next player's turn.
effect.command: Name the top card of the deck and add that card to this minion's /ancestry/. If named correctly, activate both its /Hex/ and /Command/ effect.
effect.trait: At the end of the turn, the turn player must name the top card of the deck, and draw that card if named correctly.
